title: Sales & Account Manager (Full Cycle BDR) – Remote, Full-Time
job_overview:
**PLEASE DO NOT APPLY THROUGH ONLINE JOBS. USE THE LINK AT THE BOTTOM OF THIS POST TO APPLY**

Sales & Account Manager (Full Cycle BDR) – Remote, Full-Time
Location: Remote (Must work U.S. time zone hours)
Position Type: Full-Time
Compensation: Competitive base + commission per deal + ongoing percentage of managed accounts

About the Role
We’re hiring a highly driven, client-focused Full-Cycle Sales & Account Manager to take ownership of the entire client lifecycle—from outreach to onboarding to long-term account management.

In this role, you’ll generate leads, conduct sales calls, present over Zoom, close deals, onboard clients, and oversee campaign execution. You’ll work closely with an appointment setter under your direction—and once the account enters fulfillment, you’ll step in as the Team Lead for that client.

This is a high-responsibility position with high reward: base pay, bonuses for each deal you close, and an ongoing percentage of every account you manage. If you’re organized, proactive, and love working with U.S. clients—this is an opportunity to own your book of business and get paid like a leader.


What You'll Do
Lead Generation & Appointment Setting

Research and prospect cold leads (we also provide warm and cold leads from internal databases and ad campaigns)
Write and send outreach emails, follow up, and generate initial interest
Book scheduled phone calls with qualified leads
Sales & Closing

Conduct short scheduled phone calls to share insight and qualify leads
Run full Zoom presentations to explain our services, close the deal, follow up on negotiations, send contracts, and collect payment
Client Onboarding

Guide new clients through the onboarding process
Collect brand assets, service territory details, and internal notes
Ensure smooth transition into campaign execution
Campaign Management

Direct and collaborate with your assigned appointment setter
Once the account begins fulfillment, serve as the Team Lead for that client
Strategize outreach approach and campaign execution
Maintain strong communication with the client and oversee delivery
Lead client reporting touchpoints via monthly or quarterly Zoom check-ins

You’re a Great Fit If You:
Have 3+ years of experience in sales, account management, or client success
Are confident running sales calls and presentations from first contact to close
Love working with clients—especially in the U.S. market
Have excellent written and verbal English communication skills
Understand how to de-escalate, build trust, and create long-term client satisfaction
Are organized, self-directed, and performance-driven
Can manage multiple accounts and guide others (appointment setters, internal staff)
Are comfortable using Google Workspace, CRMs, and basic project management tools
Are available full-time in U.S. time zone hours, Monday through Friday

Compensation
Base salary (monthly)
Commission for each deal you close
Ongoing percentage of account revenue for every client you manage
This is a high-income opportunity for the right person—?100,000 to ?200,000+ PHP/month is achievable with strong performance
The compensation structure is second to none for professionals who want to own and grow a book of business

About Us
We’re a U.S.-based company that helps home service businesses grow through consistent relationship-building campaigns. Our clients are typically roofers, HVAC companies, remediation companies, and other service contractors looking to expand their commercial work.

We run campaigns with structure, care, and client-first thinking—and we’re looking for professionals who do the same.


Ready to take ownership of your accounts and income?
Apply now with your résumé, a short message explaining why you’re a fit, and any links to past sales or client success results.
